strings.INTRO_BACK: I will set up my app later
strings.INTRO_BODY:
You have completed the first step to begin this journey together: downloading the app.

Next, we will go through the initial setup of the app. This process will take approximately 30 minutes and will require an internet connection. Please ensure you have plenty of time before we start this process. Otherwise, feel free to start it when you have sufficient time.
strings.INTRO_LOGIN: Letâ€™s start - I have sufficient time now
strings.INTRO_TITLE: Thank you for your interest in the study BUMP by 4YouandMe
strings.SETUP_LATER_BODY:
Ok - We can setup your app later. Please come back when you are able to spend 30 minutes with the initial app setup. This is a necessary step to partecipate in the study.

When you are ready, simply open the app again.
strings.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT:
Something went wrong,
please try again
strings.PHONE_VERIFICATION_BODY:
This app was created for participants in the study BUMP by 4YouandMe. To verify you have been recruited for this study, please enter your phone number below.

We will text you a validation code.

Please use the same phone number that you shared with the research team.
strings.ONBOARDING_ABORT_MESSAGE: If you click cancel you will return to the beginning of the app and lose all progress
strings.ONBOARDING_OPT_IN_MANDATORY_DEFAULT: Enrollment in this study require this permission
strings.ONBOARDING_USER_EMAIL_INFO: We will email you a code to validate your email address
strings.ONBOARDING_USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_BODY: Enter the verification code we sent to email address below:
strings.ONBOARDING_USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION_ERROR: The validation code is incorrect. Try with another code.
strings.ONBOARDING_USER_SIGNATURE_BODY: Please sign using your finger on the line below.
strings.PHONE_VERIFICATION_LEGAL: By checking this box, I hereby agree to the Terms of service and Privacy Policy
strings.PHONE_VERIFICATION_TITLE: Welcome to the BUMP study app
strings.ERROR_MESSAGE_CONNECTIVITY:
You seem to be offline.
Please check your internet connection and try again.
strings.ERROR_MESSAGE_REMOTE_SERVER:
Something went wrong,
please try again
strings.PHONE_VERIFICATION_CODE_BODY: We sent a text message containing a validation code to the phone number below.
strings.PHONE_VERIFICATION_ERROR_WRONG_CODE: The validation code is incorrect. Try with an other code.
strings.PHONE_VERIFICATION_ERROR_MISSING_NUMBER: This number was not recruited for the study. Try with an other number.
